                    int period,
                    boolean recurring,
                    Object assoc,
                    Clock.AlarmHandler handler)
Constructor

Parameters:
clock - the clock to which the Alarm is registered
period - the time
recurring - does the alarm repeat
assoc - an associated parameter
handler - the handler to call back when the alarm expires
